name: Aw, Snap!
description: Aw, Snap! is a game developed by Spencer Rawls, Jackson Demaree, and Hira Chaudhary for senior capstone design. It is a tablet game base on the physics-based board game Oh, Snap!. Aw, Snap! features the same mechanics as the original game, as well as brutal AI opponents, online multiplayer, data collection for a professor to study the physical interactions between pieces, and variable number of pieces and board size. However, networked features don't currently work because I took down the server.
